get-started.Use {a1_}our official server{_a}, choose: Use {a1_}our official server{_a}, choose from {a2_}a list of{_a} independently operated servers, or run your own!
get-started.Group Income doesn't use cookies to mana: Group Income doesn't use cookies to manage user accounts.
get-started.Join a Group and Start Sharing!: Join a Group and Start Sharing!
get-started.Contribute with monetary or non-monetary: Contribute with monetary or non-monetary donations and secure everyone in your group with a basic income.

home.A safe space to financially support each: A safe space to financially support each other.
home.Help guarantee access to fundamental nee: Help guarantee access to fundamental needs, independent of life circumstances in a safe and private environment thanks to end-to-end encryption.
home.Read more about our privacy and security: Read more about our privacy and security.
home.Many people contribute to our lives and: Many people contribute to our lives and our society, but are often not financially rewarded. From students to unpaid careers, from volunteers to care givers, from unemployed people to unwell.
home.Basic Income can improve the quality of: Basic Income can improve the quality of life for millions of people, simply through providing them with basic financial security and the peace of mind that goes with it.
Create your own financial safety net.
home.Create stronger communities and ensure b: Create stronger communities and ensure basic financial security for the people you care about — set a minimum income floor ("mincome"). Each month, group members help those who haven't crossed the mincome threshold.
home.Members of the group can contribute with: Members of the group can contribute with monetary or non-monetary donations, securing everyone in your group with a basic income, independent of employment.
home.The best private chat for your community: The best private chat for your community.
home.A powerful community chat with emoji rea: A powerful community chat with emoji reactions, polls, file attachments, and more — all completely private and end-to-end encrypted.
home.Group Income is built on top of an end-t: Group Income is built on top of an end-to-end encrypted protocol called {a_}Shelter Protocol{_a}.
home.Your data is stored in encrypted form on: Your data is stored in encrypted form on servers, and decrypted locally on your device. The keys to decrypt that data are derived from your password and are also stored on your device.
home.Group Income is end-to-end encrypted and: Group Income is end-to-end encrypted and self-hosted.
home.Basic Income for your friends and family: Basic Income for your friends and family.
home.Private community software with a financ: Private community software with a financial safety net, so you can focus on what matters.

get-started-page.Don't see a server you like?: Don't see a server you like?
get-started-page.Group Income is not a single website, it: Group Income is not a single website, it's more like email, anyone can run it on their own. Join our official server or join someone else's.
